allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Extend setup wizard to support any US state

Changes from NY-only to multi-state support:
- Remove NY state validation, accept any US state
- Auto-detect cities in the detected state \(not just NY\)
- Generate state-specific search templates
- County-based region creation for non-NY states
- Update UI text from "New York State" to "United States"
- Pass state code through entire config generation pipeline

Modified files:
- setup_wizard.py: Remove NY validation, add state parameter
- utils/config_generator.py: Dynamic state in TOML generation
- templates/wizard.html: Update description text
- static/wizard.js: Include state in form data, dynamic region naming
- CLAUDE.md: Update documentation for multi-state support

Backward compatible: NY counties still use named regions
\(Hudson Valley, Capital District, etc.\), other states use
county-based regions \(e.g., "Los Angeles Area"\)

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
